channel.title: Owner GolemX's COMPILER
channel.description:
hello i would first like to tell you that i did not know in what section on forums i should post this in but its my compiler that i made, it has some cool features that i will explain
so here are the features of my compiler
#1 = you can compile your server (DUHH)
#2 = open it and type "r" and it opens runserver.bat instead of you needing to look for your runserver
#3 = the cool part of the compiler : command generator the command generator is a feature i added that i got from another compiler i saw a while ago. the features on the command generator are cool first off it will ask you the command name you want, then it will ask to verify then it will take you to a new spot on the generator and will have messages saying all the things you can add to your command. here are the things the command will generate.
ai = additem t = teleport (x,y) ae = addemote s = add a sendMessage code to the command e = generates the code to enable using the command on another player EX: (c.teleportToX = 9999) ss = set skill level sc = save character files after player types command q = add the sendquest interface (will handle 20 messages from the compiler, you can add more manually) end = will add the closing bracket "}" to the end of the command and will take you to home of compiler.
i have been working on this compiler for a while now, so i am proud to release it.
credits : 90% Owner GolemX (Me) 10% Hay (created Hay's compiler, gave me a little codes)
i wont give you the link to the compiler because batch files could be dangerous and i dont want you guys to think im spreading viruses, so i will post the code here (Dont leech please) to make the batch file : 1 just make a text document, 2 paste the code into it 3 Go to "file" and press "save as" 4 name it compiler.bat 5 press save. NOTE* WHEN SAVING YOU MUST HAVE THE ".bat" AFTER THE NAME
the code : [code] @echo off color b
:main color b title server Compiler echo _______________________________________________________ echo ------------------------------------------------------- echo _____________Owner GolemX's Cool Compiler______________ echo _______________Made 100% by Owner GolemX________________ echo ------------------------------------------------------- echo Commands To Select : echo. echo c = Compile server echo r = open Runserver.bat echo i = Information on this tool echo o = Owner GolemX's Command Generator echo _______________________________________________________ echo ________________________****___________________________ set /p select= Select Option == cls
if %2select%==N goto c if %2select%==n goto c if %2select%==y goto main if %2select%==Y goto main if %select%==c goto c if %select%==C goto c if %select%==i goto i if %select%==I goto i if %select%==r goto r if %select%==R goto r if %select%==o goto o if %select%==O goto o
:c IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0\BIN" (goto compile)
:compile title Compiling server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java color d cls echo ------------------------------------------------------------------ echo Finishing... echo Inserting Updates... echo _________________________________________________________________ echo ***************************************************************** echo server successfully comipled! echo _________________________________________________________________ echo COMPILER MADE BY OWNER GOLEMX pause cls goto main
:i title Information on this tool color f cls echo ---------------------------------------------------------------- echo This was made by Owner GolemX echo Full credit to Owner GolemX __ (ME) echo ________________________________________________________________ echo this tool requires jdk 1.6.0 echo ________________________________________________________________ echo if you descide to leech this tool, echo make sure to give some credit to Owner GolemX echo ________________________________________________________________ echo ________________________________________________________________ echo THANKS FOR USING Owner GolemX's Compiler / Tool echo **************************************************************** echo ________________________________________________________________ pause cls goto main
:r title Opening Runserver.bat cls color a echo ________________________________________________________________ echo ---------------------------------------------------------------- echo *********************Opening Runserver.bat********************** echo ________________________________________________________________ echo ________________________________________________________________ echo --------------Successfully Started Runserver.bat---------------- echo ________________________________________________________________ echo ___________________________******_______________________________ echo ---------------------------------------------------------------- start runserver.bat pause cls goto main
:o :Star color c Set /p CmdName=Command Name? Set /p RUSure=Are you sure you want the commands Name: %CmdName%(yes,no)? If %RUSure%==no GOTO Star If not Exist CommandsFolder MD Commands Echo if(command.startsWith("%CmdName%")) >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo { >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" goto Meeenue cls :addItem color c cls set /p ID=ItemID? cls set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item? cls echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" goto Meeenue if %type%==* goto error echo. goto error :error cls echo Commands invalid. Only use commands from the menu. pause goto menu
:endCode color c cls Echo } >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" goto fin
:addemote cls Set /P pe=do you want to add an emote? (yes, no) If %pe%==yes GOTO makingemote If %pe%==no GOTO Meeenue
:makingemote color c cls Set /P emoteid=What is your desired emote id == Echo setAnimation(%emoteid%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo startAnimation(%emoteid%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" cls GOTO Meeenue
:Meeenue color c cls echo ------------------------------------------------------- echo pick what to do next echo _________________________________________________________ echo your choises : echo. echo ai == Add item to command echo ae == Add an emote to command echo t == add a teleport (X, Y) to command echo s == add a sendMessage to player echo e == Make code for using command on another player "c." echo ss == set skill level echo sc == save character who types the command echo q == make a "send quest" interface echo end == end and save command echo _________________________________________________________ Set /P troll=Whats your descision == If %troll%==ai GOTO addItem If %troll%==AI GOTO addItem If %troll%==Ai GOTO addItem If %troll%==aI GOTO addItem If %troll%==ae GOTO addemote If %troll%==AE GOTO addemote If %troll%==aE GOTO addemote If %troll%==Ae GOTO addemote If %troll%==t GOTO Tele If %troll%==T GOTO Tele If %troll%==end GOTO endCode If %troll%==END GOTO endCode If %troll%==EnD GOTO endCode If %troll%==eNd GOTO endCode If %troll%==ENd GOTO endCode If %troll%==enD GOTO endCode if %troll%==End Goto endcode If %troll%==s GOTO SMTPO If %troll%==S GOTO SMTPO If %troll%==e GOTO e If %troll%==E GOTO e If %troll%==ss GOTO ss If %troll%==SS GOTO ss If %troll%==Ss GOTO ss If %troll%==sS GOTO ss If %troll%==sc GOTO sc If %troll%==SC GOTO sc If %troll%==Sc GOTO sc If %troll%==sC GOTO sc If %troll%==q GOTO q If %troll%==Q GOTO q
:Tele color c cls Set /P X=XCoord Tele? Set /P Y=YCoord Tele? Echo teleportToX = %X% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" goto Meeenue cls
:fin echo Command creation complete. Find it in the commands folder. pause cls goto main
:SM color c cls Set /P SMTP=Message = Echo sendMessage("%SMTP%"); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" goto Meeenue cls
:SMTPO color c cls echo ______________________________________________________ echo you are here to make a sendMessage to player. echo this will add sendMessage("message"); to the player echo. echo now type (yes, no) to choose if you want to add echo a sendMessage. echo _______________________________________________________ Set /P SM=Will you make a sendMessage (yes,no) = If %SM%==yes GOTO SM If %SM%==YES GOTO SM If %SM%==Yes GOTO SM If %SM%==no GOTO Meeenue If %SM%==NO GOTO Meeenue If %SM%==No GOTO Meeenue
:e color c cls echo ______________________________________________________ echo in this area you will make a thing so you can use c. echo so you can use it on another player echo. echo now type (yes, no) to choose if you want to create echo the code to be able to do so. echo _______________________________________________________ Set /P aSM=create a code to use command on other players? (yes,no) = If %aSM%==yes GOTO aSM If %aSM%==YES GOTO aSM If %aSM%==Yes GOTO aSM If %aSM%==no GOTO Meeenue If %aSM%==NO GOTO Meeenue If %aSM%==No GOTO Meeenue
:aSM color c cls Echo client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" cls goto Meeenue
:ss color c cls echo ________________________________________________________ echo you are here to make a code that will change your echo skill level. here are the instructions :: echo. echo first, you go to the spot to make it (type yes) echo second just type the skill (id) ex: 0 = attack echo third just type the level for the skill to go to. echo then your done! echo ________________________________________________________ Set /P setskill=Make a skill level code? (yes,no) = cls goto woot
:woot color c cls Set /P setid=What is the skill id you are choosing = Set /P setlevel=What level should it make you in that stat? = Echo playerLevel[%setid%] = %setlevel%; >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo setSkillLevel(%setid%, %setlevel%, playerLevel[%setid%]); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" cls goto Meeenue
:sc color c cls echo ________________________________________________________________ echo in this area you dont need to do anything much... echo. echo just type yes and you will be pretty much done. echo THIS WILL SAVE THE CHAR FILES OF THE CHAR THAT DID THE COMMAND echo ________________________________________________________________ Set /P 5678=Make this command save the character files? (yes,no) = cls If %5678%==yes GOTO sc2 If %5678%==Yes GOTO sc2 If %5678%==yEs GOTO sc2 If %5678%==yeS GOTO sc2 If %5678%==YES GOTO sc2 If %5678%==YeS GOTO sc2 If %5678%==yES GOTO sc2 If %5678%==no GOTO Meeenue If %5678%==nO GOTO Meeenue If %5678%==No GOTO Meeenue If %5678%==NO GOTO Meeenue cls
:sc2 color c cls Echo savemoreinfo(); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo savechar(); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" cls goto Meeenue
:q cls echo ____________________________________________________________________ echo you came to make a send quest interface with dialogues? echo just type the messages and they go into the code. echo there are 20 message places inserted, echo if you do not use all 20, they will be left blank. echo ____________________________________________________________________ Set /P 001=Make a sendQuest code inserted to your command? (y, n) = If %001%==y GOTO q2 If %001%==Y GOTO q2 If %001%==n GOTO Meeenue If %001%==N GOTO Meeenue cls
:q2 cls Set /P sendqtitle=Title of interface = Set /P sendq1=Quest #1 = Set /P sendq2=Quest #2 = Set /P sendq3=Quest #3 = Set /P sendq4=Quest #4 = Set /P sendq5=Quest #5 = Set /P sendq6=Quest #6 = Set /P sendq7=Quest #7 = Set /P sendq8=Quest #8 = Set /P sendq9=Quest #9 = Set /P sendq10=Quest #10 = Set /P sendq11=Quest #11 = Set /P sendq12=Quest #12 = Set /P sendq13=Quest #13 = Set /P sendq14=Quest #14 = Set /P sendq15=Quest #15 = Set /P sendq16=Quest #16 = Set /P sendq17=Quest #17 = Set /P sendq18=Quest #18 = Set /P sendq19=Quest #19 = Set /P sendq20=Quest #20 = Echo sendQuest("%sendqtitle%", 8144); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo clearQuestInterface(); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq1%", 8145); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq2%", 8146); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq3%", 8147); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq4%", 8148); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq5%", 8149); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq6%", 8150); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq7%", 8151); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq8%", 8152); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq9%", 8153); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq10%", 8154); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq11%", 8155); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq12%", 8156); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq13%", 8157); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq14%", 8158); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq15%", 8159); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq16%", 8160); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq17%", 8161); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq18%", 8162); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq19%", 8163); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuest("%sendq20%", 8164); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo sendQuestSomething(8174); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo showInterface(8134); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" Echo flushOutStream(); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt" cls goto q3
:q3 cls echo ___________________________________________ echo send Quests Generated! echo ___________________________________________ Set /P back=go back to Main? (yes,no) =
If %back%==yes GOTO Meeenue If %back%==YES GOTO Meeenue If %back%==Yes GOTO Meeenue If %back%==NO GOTO Meeenue If %back%==No GOTO Meeenue If %back%==nO GOTO Meeenue If %back%==no GOTO Meeenue cls
[/code]
so now you have a good compiler, dont leech, if you do atleast give me and Hay some credit. NOTE* The command generator may not work for your server kind, you might need to edit it to fit your server.
Thanks, Happy Compiling. -OGolemX AKA (Owner GolemX)

item.title: Owner GolemX's COMPILER
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

hello i would first like to tell you that i did not know in what section on forums i should post this in but its my compiler that i made, it has some cool features that i will explain

so here are the features of my compiler

#1 = you can compile your server (DUHH)

#2 = open it and type “r” and it opens runserver.bat instead of you needing to look for your runserver

#3 = the cool part of the compiler : command generator
the command generator is a feature i added that i got from another compiler i saw a while ago.
the features on the command generator are cool
first off it will ask you the command name you want, then it will ask to verify
then it will take you to a new spot on the generator and will have messages saying all the things you can add to your command.
here are the things the command will generate.

ai = additem
t = teleport (x,y)
ae = addemote
s = add a sendMessage code to the command
e = generates the code to enable using the command on another player EX: (c.teleportToX = 9999)
ss = set skill level
sc = save character files after player types command
q = add the sendquest interface (will handle 20 messages from the compiler, you can add more manually)
end = will add the closing bracket “}” to the end of the command and will take you to home of compiler.

i have been working on this compiler for a while now, so i am proud to release it.

credits : 90% Owner GolemX (Me)
10% Hay (created Hay’s compiler, gave me a little codes)

i wont give you the link to the compiler because batch files could be dangerous and i dont want you guys to think im spreading viruses, so i will post the code here (Dont leech please)
to make the batch file :
1 just make a text document,
2 paste the code into it
3 Go to “file” and press “save as”
4 name it compiler.bat
5 press save.
NOTE* WHEN SAVING YOU MUST HAVE THE “.bat” AFTER THE NAME

the code :

@echo off
color b

:main
color b
title server Compiler
echo _______________________________________________________
echo -------------------------------------------------------
echo _____________Owner GolemX's Cool Compiler______________
echo _______________Made 100% by Owner GolemX________________
echo -------------------------------------------------------
echo Commands To Select :
echo. 
echo c = Compile server
echo r = open Runserver.bat
echo i = Information on this tool
echo o = Owner GolemX's Command Generator
echo _______________________________________________________
echo ________________________****___________________________
set /p select= Select Option == 
cls

if %2select%==N goto c
if %2select%==n goto c
if %2select%==y goto main
if %2select%==Y goto main
if %select%==c goto c
if %select%==C goto c
if %select%==i goto i
if %select%==I goto i
if %select%==r goto r
if %select%==R goto r
if %select%==o goto o
if %select%==O goto o

:c
IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0\BIN" (goto compile)

:compile
title Compiling server
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
color d
cls
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------
echo Finishing...
echo Inserting Updates...
echo _________________________________________________________________
echo *****************************************************************
echo               server successfully comipled!
echo _________________________________________________________________
echo COMPILER MADE BY OWNER GOLEMX
pause
cls
goto main


:i
title Information on this tool
color f
cls
echo ----------------------------------------------------------------
echo This was made by Owner GolemX
echo Full credit to Owner GolemX __ (ME)
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo this tool requires jdk 1.6.0
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo if you descide to leech this tool,
echo make sure to give some credit to Owner GolemX
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo THANKS FOR USING Owner GolemX's Compiler / Tool
echo ****************************************************************
echo ________________________________________________________________
pause
cls
goto main

:r
title Opening Runserver.bat
cls
color a
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo ----------------------------------------------------------------
echo *********************Opening Runserver.bat**********************
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo --------------Successfully Started Runserver.bat----------------
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo ___________________________******_______________________________
echo ----------------------------------------------------------------
start runserver.bat
pause
cls
goto main

:o
:Star
color c
Set /p CmdName=Command Name?
Set /p RUSure=Are you sure you want the commands Name: %CmdName%(yes,no)?
If %RUSure%==no GOTO Star
If not Exist CommandsFolder MD Commands
Echo if(command.startsWith("%CmdName%")) >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Echo { >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
goto Meeenue
cls
:addItem
color c
cls
set /p ID=ItemID?
cls
set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item?
cls
echo     addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
goto Meeenue
if %type%==* goto error
echo.
goto error
:error
cls
echo Commands invalid. Only use commands from the menu.
pause
goto menu

:endCode
color c
cls
Echo } >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
goto fin

:addemote
cls
Set /P pe=do you want to add an emote? (yes, no)
If %pe%==yes GOTO makingemote
If %pe%==no GOTO Meeenue

:makingemote
color c
cls
Set /P emoteid=What is your desired emote id == 
Echo setAnimation(%emoteid%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Echo startAnimation(%emoteid%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
cls
GOTO Meeenue

:Meeenue
color c
cls
echo -------------------------------------------------------
echo pick what to do next 
echo _________________________________________________________
echo your choises : 
echo. 
echo ai == Add item to command
echo ae == Add an emote to command
echo t == add a teleport (X, Y) to command
echo s == add a sendMessage to player
echo e == Make code for using command on another player "c."
echo ss == set skill level
echo sc == save character who types the command
echo q == make a "send quest" interface
echo end == end and save command
echo _________________________________________________________
Set /P troll=Whats your descision == 
If %troll%==ai GOTO addItem
If %troll%==AI GOTO addItem
If %troll%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %troll%==aI GOTO addItem
If %troll%==ae GOTO addemote
If %troll%==AE GOTO addemote
If %troll%==aE GOTO addemote
If %troll%==Ae GOTO addemote
If %troll%==t GOTO Tele
If %troll%==T GOTO Tele
If %troll%==end GOTO endCode
If %troll%==END GOTO endCode
If %troll%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %troll%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %troll%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %troll%==enD GOTO endCode
if %troll%==End Goto endcode
If %troll%==s GOTO SMTPO
If %troll%==S GOTO SMTPO
If %troll%==e GOTO e
If %troll%==E GOTO e
If %troll%==ss GOTO ss
If %troll%==SS GOTO ss
If %troll%==Ss GOTO ss
If %troll%==sS GOTO ss
If %troll%==sc GOTO sc
If %troll%==SC GOTO sc
If %troll%==Sc GOTO sc
If %troll%==sC GOTO sc
If %troll%==q GOTO q
If %troll%==Q GOTO q

:Tele
color c
cls
Set /P X=XCoord Tele?
Set /P Y=YCoord Tele?
Echo teleportToX = %X% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
goto Meeenue
cls

:fin
echo Command creation complete. Find it in the commands folder.
pause
cls
goto main

:SM
color c
cls
Set /P SMTP=Message = 
Echo sendMessage("%SMTP%"); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
goto Meeenue
cls

:SMTPO
color c
cls
echo ______________________________________________________
echo you are here to make a sendMessage to player.
echo this will add sendMessage("message"); to the player
echo. 
echo now type (yes, no) to choose if you want to add 
echo a sendMessage.
echo _______________________________________________________
Set /P SM=Will you make a sendMessage (yes,no) = 
If %SM%==yes GOTO SM
If %SM%==YES GOTO SM
If %SM%==Yes GOTO SM
If %SM%==no GOTO Meeenue
If %SM%==NO GOTO Meeenue
If %SM%==No GOTO Meeenue

:e
color c
cls
echo ______________________________________________________
echo in this area you will make a thing so you can use c.
echo so you can use it on another player 
echo. 
echo now type (yes, no) to choose if you want to create
echo the code to be able to do so.
echo _______________________________________________________
Set /P aSM=create a code to use command on other players? (yes,no) = 
If %aSM%==yes GOTO aSM
If %aSM%==YES GOTO aSM
If %aSM%==Yes GOTO aSM
If %aSM%==no GOTO Meeenue
If %aSM%==NO GOTO Meeenue
If %aSM%==No GOTO Meeenue

:aSM
color c
cls
Echo client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
cls
goto Meeenue

:ss
color c
cls
echo ________________________________________________________
echo you are here to make a code that will change your
echo skill level. here are the instructions ::
echo. 
echo first, you go to the spot to make it (type yes)
echo second just type the skill (id) ex: 0 = attack
echo third just type the level for the skill to go to.
echo then your done!
echo ________________________________________________________
Set /P setskill=Make a skill level code? (yes,no) = 
cls
goto woot

:woot
color c
cls
Set /P setid=What is the skill id you are choosing = 
Set /P setlevel=What level should it make you in that stat? = 
Echo 			playerLevel[%setid%] = %setlevel%; >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Echo 		setSkillLevel(%setid%, %setlevel%, playerLevel[%setid%]); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
cls
goto Meeenue

:sc
color c
cls
echo ________________________________________________________________
echo in this area you dont need to do anything much...
echo. 
echo just type yes and you will be pretty much done.
echo THIS WILL SAVE THE CHAR FILES OF THE CHAR THAT DID THE COMMAND
echo ________________________________________________________________
Set /P 5678=Make this command save the character files? (yes,no) = 
cls
If %5678%==yes GOTO sc2
If %5678%==Yes GOTO sc2
If %5678%==yEs GOTO sc2
If %5678%==yeS GOTO sc2
If %5678%==YES GOTO sc2
If %5678%==YeS GOTO sc2
If %5678%==yES GOTO sc2
If %5678%==no GOTO Meeenue
If %5678%==nO GOTO Meeenue
If %5678%==No GOTO Meeenue
If %5678%==NO GOTO Meeenue
cls

:sc2
color c
cls
Echo 		savemoreinfo(); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Echo 		savechar(); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
cls
goto Meeenue

:q
cls
echo ____________________________________________________________________
echo you came to make a send quest interface with dialogues?
echo just type the messages and they go into the code.
echo there are 20 message places inserted,
echo if you do not use all 20, they will be left blank.
echo ____________________________________________________________________
Set /P 001=Make a sendQuest code inserted to your command? (y, n) = 
If %001%==y GOTO q2
If %001%==Y GOTO q2
If %001%==n GOTO Meeenue
If %001%==N GOTO Meeenue
cls

:q2
cls
Set /P sendqtitle=Title of interface = 
Set /P sendq1=Quest #1 = 
Set /P sendq2=Quest #2 = 
Set /P sendq3=Quest #3 = 
Set /P sendq4=Quest #4 = 
Set /P sendq5=Quest #5 = 
Set /P sendq6=Quest #6 = 
Set /P sendq7=Quest #7 = 
Set /P sendq8=Quest #8 = 
Set /P sendq9=Quest #9 = 
Set /P sendq10=Quest #10 = 
Set /P sendq11=Quest #11 = 
Set /P sendq12=Quest #12 = 
Set /P sendq13=Quest #13 = 
Set /P sendq14=Quest #14 = 
Set /P sendq15=Quest #15 = 
Set /P sendq16=Quest #16 = 
Set /P sendq17=Quest #17 =

cls
goto q3

:q3
cls
echo ___________________________________________
echo send Quests Generated!
echo ___________________________________________
Set /P back=go back to Main? (yes,no) = 

If %back%==yes GOTO Meeenue
If %back%==YES GOTO Meeenue
If %back%==Yes GOTO Meeenue
If %back%==NO GOTO Meeenue
If %back%==No GOTO Meeenue
If %back%==nO GOTO Meeenue
If %back%==no GOTO Meeenue
cls
